page.title: 09Country Estate
page.content: Most of this block is part of the {Chatsworth Estate,}which stretches from{Halton East}to{Kex Farm}on the {A59 road,}and from{Kex Beck}to{Barden. The{Duke of Devonshire}owns it. The Duke and his family and guests stay at{Bolton Hall,}which was the Priory Gate House, when they come to Bolton Abbey in August to{shoot {grouse. He owns the{Devonshire Arms}which has been altered and extended recently. The Estate employs a lot of people (see Employment page). All of the farm buildings, and nearly all the farm land are rented from the Estate.
